CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Account.ParentId)), ( Account.Parent.BillingStreet & BR() & Account.Parent.BillingCity & ", " & TEXT(Account.Parent.BillingStateCode) & " " & Account.Parent.BillingPostalCode ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Contact.MailingStreet)), ( Contact.MailingStreet & BR() & Contact.MailingCity & ", " & TEXT(Contact.MailingStateCode) & " " & Contact.MailingPostalCode ), ( Account.BillingStreet & BR() & Account.BillingCity & ", " & TEXT(Account.BillingStateCode) & " " & Account.BillingPostalCode ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Renders the address for conga templates based on the following priority: Case.Account.Parent's address; Case.Contact's address; Case.Account's address
CustomField.label: Conga Contact Address
